name: Sugar Cube Adventure
description:
*Game In Development*

You are enjoying some afternoon tea on a sunny day, but then you spot something shiny in the grass. You examine the shiny object and find a Shiny Sugar Cube. The shiny cube flies away and you chase after it, only for it to fly in a ditch. You jump down and find yourself in another land of shiny sugar cubes and in ball form. Explore the Shiny Sugar Cube land and take on a scavenger hunt for the cubes of sweetness.
